Adaptable.name: 适应
Adaptable.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-racial-abilities.Adaptable]{Adaptable} (1): The race has great variation among its people and cultures. Characters start with a free Novice @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01edges000000000]{Edge} of their choice (and must meet all the Edge’s Requirements).
